ygData.subject: Re: Elidain
ygData.msgSnippet: At 27th the best DD spell you can cast does 165 damage!?  I do 173 at level 21 with Force Shock, do wizards not get a direct damage spell at 24?  As for
ygData.messageBody:
At 27th the best DD spell you can cast does 165 damage!? I do 173 at level
21 with Force Shock, do wizards not get a direct damage spell at 24? As for
dueling I never got into EQ to duel so I am not too worried about that. I
know that when myself and one wizard friend get together in a free for all
area like the orc area in Highpass Hold we get more than our fair share of
the kills regardless of who is there necros, wizards, whoever.

One huge advantage, we get travel and group travel only druids get similar
spells as I recall. I love being able to hit Erudin to get spells at a
reasonable cost and sell for top prices and then bounce back to Faydwer or
wherever, that is an enormous power.

-- Elidain Erudite Wizard 21rst Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Shane [mailto:xscion@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 12:26 PM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Elidain
>
>
> From: "Shane" <xscion@...>
>
> Elidain, "us" refers to Wizards. The class that has
> nothing. Give me
> an example of what we have over any class, and I will bash it into the
> ground with another example that blows it away. As to
> fizzles, etc... We
> are the slowest casters in the game. I dueled a Necromancer
> that had the
> same HP as I, and we agreed to do DD spells only, in which he
> did 160 damage
> and I did 165. The Necromancer won. I have higher Magic
> resistance, but
> his spells did full damage every time. My spell did full
> damage once, and
> it looked to be about 4 damage the second time. Just so you
> know, we dueled
> with NO BUFFS on. The speed of his spell was too much, as he
> always was
> ahead of my casts. Anyways, I'm out. Someone try to tell me a reason
> Wizards are better, and I will defend my statement that we suck.
>
>
> - Zenon Amphitryon, 27th, Fennin Ro
